entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 2:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -8.6°C
Wind: E 21 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow. Snow at times heavy beginning late this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy or freezing drizzle. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets changing to periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
